analysis.description:
KyberNetwork.trade (/unique_chucks/15/0x842182360dfae06c6a84e8a47d37aeeadb115694.sol#607-689) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ! msg.sender.send(tradeInfo.remainedSourceAmount) (/unique_chucks/15/0x842182360dfae06c6a84e8a47d37aeeadb115694.sol#678-679)

KyberReserve.doTrade (/unique_chucks/15/0x842182360dfae06c6a84e8a47d37aeeadb115694.sol#86-178) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- destAmount == 0
output in KyberNetwork.findBestRate (/unique_chucks/15/0x842182360dfae06c6a84e8a47d37aeeadb115694.sol#461-463) is a local variable never initialiazed
bestRate in KyberNetwork.findBestRate (/unique_chucks/15/0x842182360dfae06c6a84e8a47d37aeeadb115694.sol#457-458) is a local variable never initialiazed

KyberNetwork.doSingleTrade (/unique_chucks/15/0x842182360dfae06c6a84e8a47d37aeeadb115694.sol#491-522) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-source.transferFrom(msg.sender,this,amount) (/unique_chucks/15/0x842182360dfae06c6a84e8a47d37aeeadb115694.sol#501-504)
	-source.approve(reserve,amount) (/unique_chucks/15/0x842182360dfae06c6a84e8a47d37aeeadb115694.sol#507-508)
	-source.approve(reserve,0) (/unique_chucks/15/0x842182360dfae06c6a84e8a47d37aeeadb115694.sol#521)

ERC20.totalSupply.totalSupply (local variable @ /unique_chucks/15/0x842182360dfae06c6a84e8a47d37aeeadb115694.sol#5-6) shadows:
	- ERC20.totalSupply (function @ /unique_chucks/15/0x842182360dfae06c6a84e8a47d37aeeadb115694.sol#5-6)

KyberNetwork.findBestRate has external calls inside a loop:
	- (rate,expBlock,balance) = reserves[i].getPairInfo(source,dest) (/unique_chucks/15/0x842182360dfae06c6a84e8a47d37aeeadb115694.sol#468-472)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/15/0x842182360dfae06c6a84e8a47d37aeeadb115694.sol#51-53:
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"
